Paragraf.text: I'm Matthias, Frontend Developer looking for professional challanges, and this is my portfolio.
If you want to see more swipe right.

I'm a Front-End developer, living in Stockholm. I'm passionate about making better www's, one website at a time. My guiding principles are aesthetics, functionality and user-friendliness. And I have “Keep it simple, stupid” tattooed on my left leg…. Not.

My long term goal is that I at some point of my career will be part of a project that “makes a difference ... makes the world a little better”. I have done some volunteering for Kodcentrum Stockholm, teaching young people programming. That might not save the world but I feel it is important to be involved and be able to contribute
And…my short-term selfish goal is to get developing and interesting work assignments. Preferably well-paid and with fantastic colleagues.

After studying, practicing and doing some development work in frontend, I have come a long way in learning about web development. I have good knowledge of the basics and have immersed myself in frameworks, mainly React.

view.header: Fun projects that I have done in my spare time.

Paragraf.text: Car Bingo game - made with react and strapi because I wanted to learn and master Headless
Got an assignment where I would build in a week a platform for a floorball tournament with react and .net
Karakou - The singer in the band Karakou wanted a virtual promotional tool for their gigs so I created a website for them
Thesis - My thesis was about moving a platform from one framework to another
